scripts.test: truffle compile && npm run docker:run && npm run docker:wait-gas && npm run deploy:devnet && npm run test:devnet && npm run docker:stop
scripts.publish:rpc: aragon apm publish major $(npm run deploy:kit:rpc | tail -n 1) --environment default
scripts.deploy:kit:rpc: aragon contracts compile --all && ENS=0x5f6f7e8cc7346a11ca2def8f827b7a0b612c56a1 aragon contracts exec --network rpc scripts/fundraising-deploy.js
scripts.publish:staging: aragon apm publish major $(npm run deploy:kit:staging | tail -n 1) --environment staging
scripts.deploy:kit:staging: aragon contracts compile --all && ENS=0xfe03625ea880a8cba336f9b5ad6e15b0a3b5a939 aragon contracts exec --network rinkeby scripts/fundraising-deploy.js
scripts.publish:rinkeby: aragon apm publish major $(npm run deploy:kit:rinkeby | tail -n 1) --environment rinkeby
scripts.deploy:kit:rinkeby: aragon contracts compile --all && ENS=0x98Df287B6C145399Aaa709692c8D308357bC085D aragon contracts exec --network rinkeby scripts/fundraising-deploy.js
scripts.publish:mainnet: aragon apm publish major $(npm run deploy:kit:mainnet | tail -n 1) --environment mainnet
scripts.deploy:kit:mainnet: aragon contracts compile --all && ENS=0x314159265dd8dbb310642f98f50c066173c1259b aragon contracts exec --network mainnet scripts/fundraising-deploy.js
